data.text:
Director: Victor Schertzinger

Producer: Paramount Pictures

Writers: Marion Dix, George Marion Jr., Percy Heath

Cinematographer: Henry W. Gerrard

Editor: Robert Bassler

Costume: Travis Banton

Sound Engineer: Gene Merritt

Music: George Marion Jr., Richard A. Whiting

Cast

Charles ‘Buddy’ Rogers (William Butler Reynolds)

Kathryn Crawford (Jacqueline)

Josephine Dunn (Maxine)

Carole Lombard (Pauline)

Roscoe Karns (Bertram Shapiro)

Richard Tucker (F. Carstair Reynolds)

Francis McDonald (Phil Kemptom)

Raoul Paoli (Jules)

Virginia Bruce (Alma McGregor)

Geneva Mitchell (Cleo Carewe)

Louise Beavers (Messalina)

Lawrence Grant (Commander Brinker)

Tom London (uncredited)

Russ Powell (uncredited)

Charles Sullivan (uncredited)

Plot Summary

William Butler is sent to live in New York by his rich uncle. He moves in with three chorus girls – Jacqueline, Maxine, and Pauline – who are paid $10,000 each to “protecting” him from gold diggers so that he may safely inherit $25 million on his 21st birthday.
